meanings.definition: A large, modern movie theater complex.
meanings.sent1: We went to the cineplex to watch the latest superhero movie.
meanings.sent2: The cineplex in our town has ten screens showing different films.
meanings.sent3: The cineplex was so big, it felt like a maze of movies!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cineplex of memories, each screen playing a different moment from her past.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the cineplex beckoned movie lovers from afar.

meanings.definition: A commercial building or complex containing multiple movie theaters.
meanings.sent1: The cineplex downtown is always busy on weekends.
meanings.sent2: We decided to have dinner at the restaurant next to the cineplex.
meanings.sent3: The cineplex seemed like a city of films, with each theater a different neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His imagination was a cineplex of stories waiting to be told.
meanings.sent5: The cineplex stood tall, a beacon for movie enthusiasts.
